questions.question: What symbol is used to write ratios?
How do you say the ratio 3:5?

Can ratios have more than two parts?
Do you include units when writing ratios?
Must the units be the same in a ratio?

What is a common factor?
questions.answer: A number that divides into all parts
options: A number that divides into all parts
